unittitle_ssm: Corporal Harry Bloom World War I correspondence
abstract_ssm: Harry Bloom was a corporal with Company H, 327th Infantry in France, and appears to have lived at 1014 Eastern Parkway in Brooklyn, NY. This collections consists oftwenty letters and one postcard from Corporal Harry Bloom, primarily addressed to his parents.
